articles.author: Reuters
articles.title: Nearly 100 food aid trucks violently looted in Gaza, UN agencies say - Reuters
articles.description: Nearly 100 trucks carrying food for Palestinians were violently looted on Nov. 16 after entering Gaza in one of the worst aid losses during 13 months of war in the enclave, where hunger is deepening, two U.N. agencies told Reuters on Monday.
